input.sentences: here is our little one joining us for the adventure !
here is daddy exploring the natural area .
here are my two men in front of a big rock !
here is the whole family at the beach !
our little one is all by himself at the beach !
output.sentences: The baby was displeased with the travel arrangements.
A man walked in the desert alongside a huge building.
The child was no happier with the man in front of the structure than he was some time before.
Now joined by a woman, the three posed for a brief picture in front of the water.
In the stroller, the baby contemplated his escape.
